ygData.subject: Re: Bard Quests
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Jyzan s right from my experience, even the non-casting Solusek Goblin or Solusek Champions see right thru my invis song. Also have found it easiest to kill
ygData.messageBody:
>"Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" wrote:
>
> > From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
> >
> > Can you safely get to the area where the Solusek Mage and Champion spawn
>by
> > singing the Invis song or are there mobs along the path that can See
>Invis?
>
>I don't claim to be an expert on Solusek A, having spent a total of one
>night there, but we did
>have to do a corpse recovery and I can say that any of the goblins who had
>"Solusek" in front of
>their names seem to be able to see invis. (Which led to more corpse
>recoveries - ouch)
>
>You can probably invis part of the way in, then fight the rest of the way,
>though it's not that
>hard to just clear the whole path.
>
>Jyzan

Jyzan's right from my experience, even the non-casting Solusek Goblin or
Solusek Champions see right thru my invis song. Also have found it easiest
to kill these things using stacked DoTs and Hymn. I STILL need the boots and
vambraces, after 7 hours of camping it, killing every solusek gobbo from
king room to the room with double doors. =\

Sartori D'Elsiraad <The Companions>
Bard of Kelethin of the 48th Chorus
Veeshan
